name: Grave-ity (Cèdre)
description:
Grave-ity is a puzzle game made by Pandamonium for the Coding Blocks Jam '23. We are a small team of friends who met during their game design studies.

This is the second video game we make together, but the #cbjam is our first game jam participation.

To play the game, download and unzip the windows.zip file. Then, open the folder and double click on the ConkaveKonvex.exe file.

Music credits : 

"Metaphysik" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
